name: Bug Blast
description:
Bug Blast is a top-down space shooter that provides the player multiple ways of carrying out the stand against the hive of alien space bugs that are invading our
solar system. The player travels the solar system recovering fallen stations from the war.

Features:

- 3 unique weapon types
- 3 distict, challenging enemies
- Objective-based Gameplay
- Difficulty Scaling
- Engaging Boss
- Arcade-like Controls
